duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct support to individuals with unique behavioral and/or mental health challenges, ensuring their safety and wellbeing.
Assist with personal care, physical lifting, and therapeutic holds as per individual support plans.
Assist in the development and implementation of teaching procedures for individual support plans.
Analyze data and develop graphic presentations to determine teaching program effectiveness.
Facilitate and monitor crisis intervention and prevention responses as needed.
Encourage community engagement and the development of new relationships for the individuals.
Ensure proper administration of medications and treatments as per clinical orders and procedures.
Participate in comprehensive program-specific training and orientation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Psychology, Education or related field preferred
